text: You are training a deep learning model for semantic image segmentation with reduced training time. While using a Deep Learning VM Image, you receive the following error: The resource 'projects/deeplearning-platforn/zones/europe-west4-c/acceleratorTypes/nvidia-tesla-k80' was not found. What should you do?

choices.text: Ensure that you have GPU quota in the selected region.
Ensure that the required GPU is available in the selected region.
Ensure that you have preemptible GPU quota in the selected region.
Ensure that the selected GPU has enough GPU memory for the workload.
